title:This is a collection of jeykan and Sefferoni's god/recommended rolls focusing primarily on PvE.
description:Thanks to Sefferoni for recommending stuff that I'm too stupid to realize, and oh, some PvP rolls.

// duke mk. 44
//notes:Not really the best PvE hand cannon to use, Spare Rations is, in our opinion the better gun for PvE, still very decent though. Recommended MW - Range or Stability - jeykan
